Headline: #119 Michigan/119th Temporary Westbound Reroute near 119th/Marshfield
ShortDescription: Westbound 119 Michigan/119th buses are temporarily rerouted via 119th, Ashland, 115th, Vincennes, and 119th due to, street blockage at 119th/Marshfield.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #119 Michigan/119th buses are temporarily rerouted via 119th, Ashland, 115th, Vincennes, and 119th due to, street blockage at 119th/Marshfield.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Western (O'Hare)
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Western (O'Hare) due to debris on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Western (O'Hare) due to debris on the tracks.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
